meanings.definition: The language or jargon used on the internet or in online communication.
meanings.sent1: I had trouble understanding the cyberspeak in the chatroom.
meanings.sent2: She quickly picked up the cyberspeak commonly used in online forums.
meanings.sent3: The cyberspeak they were using sounded like a secret code to me.
meanings.sent4: The cyberspeak of hackers is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Learning cyberspeak is like learning a new language.

meanings.definition: To communicate using language specific to the internet or online platforms.
meanings.sent1: He loves to cyberspeak with his friends through messaging apps.
meanings.sent2: They cyberspeak effortlessly, making online conversations fun.
meanings.sent3: I tried to cyberspeak with emojis, but it just confused everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the digital age, we cyberspeak more than we talk face-to-face.
meanings.sent5: Cyberspeaking allows us to connect with people worldwide instantly.
